Topic.Title: I'm just going to ignore the facts and vote Obama

Message.Msg: I will not divulge whom has earned my vote. But, this is a stock message board, and the market has doubled during the Obama regime. That is a fact! Give credit and blame equally!
As long as the 5 day smoothed moving average 5SMA is moving upwards BUY, when it turns down SELL. Simplest TA in the world.Pull up any chart and see what I mean.

Topic.Title: The New Message Board Format Sucks!

Message.Msg: When co's change their site,they should first submit it to perhaps a person with 10th. grade education. The whiz kids that design things seem to be writing crap for other whiz kids. They never test the new stuff on potential users.
